attributes.title: YouTube OK with Dead Bodies, Apparently?
attributes.caption: YouTuber Logan Paul is no stranger to pulling stunts for attention, but his most recent video saw him showing off a recent suicide victim in Japan.
attributes.description:
US National Suicide Prevention Hotline: 1-800-273-8255
International Crisis Centers: http://iasp.info/resources/Crisis_Centres/

YouTuber Logan Paul is no stranger to pulling stunts for attention, but his most recent video saw him showing off a recent suicide victim in Japan. YouTube content creators are criticizing Paul for crossing the line and demanding a response from YouTube. YouTube is... not too fussed about it, apparently.
attributes.display_title: YouTube OK with Dead Bodies, Apparently?

attributes.title: PC Gaming Apocalypse?
attributes.description: A huge design flaw has been found in Intel processors, and the fix could have some major ramifications for PC gaming. Or not? We break down some of the latest reports about Intel's CPU apocalypse.

attributes.title: Youtube FINALLY Addresses Recent Controversy
attributes.description: YouTube... actually did something? Following loads of criticism about their treatment of Logan Paul's recent antics, YouTube stepped up to the plate and handed down some punishment. Will it be enough for the YouTube community?

attributes.title: Google STEPS IN to Fix YouTube
attributes.caption: YouTube's had some pretty major issues that have led to advertisers pulling out of the platform. That's no good for Google, who like money. So now Dad's stepping in to fix the mess.
attributes.description: YouTube's had some pretty major issues that have led to advertisers pulling out of the platform. That's no good for Google, who like money. So now Dad's stepping in to fix the mess.
attributes.display_title: Google STEPS IN to Fix YouTube

attributes.title: YouTube KILLING Small Channels!
attributes.caption: What better way to keep big YouTube stars from misbehaving than by demonetizing every single small channel on the platform? BUT WAIT, THERE'S A TWIST!
attributes.description: What better way to keep big YouTube stars from misbehaving than by demonetizing every single small channel on the platform? BUT WAIT, THERE'S A TWIST!

attributes.title: YouTube's Biggest Gamers Moving to TWITCH
attributes.caption: A bunch of the big gaming YouTubers are making Twitch-exclusive content as part of a new deal.
attributes.description:
A bunch of the big gaming YouTubers are making Twitch-exclusive content as part of a new deal.
Wait, are Markiplier and Jacksepticeye actually Disney princes?
attributes.display_title: YouTube's Biggest Gamers Moving to TWITCH

attributes.title: Bitcoin is BAD NEWS for PC Gamers!?
attributes.caption: Nvidia's asking retailers to prioritize gamers for graphics card sales, but that's not stopping the price gouging or the fact that Nvidia's happily helping cryptocurrency miners out.
attributes.description: Nvidia's asking retailers to prioritize gamers for graphics card sales, but that's not stopping the price gouging or the fact that Nvidia's happily helping cryptocurrency miners out.
attributes.display_title: Bitcoin is BAD NEWS for PC Gamers!?

attributes.title: Bitcoin Miners Deprive Gamers of How Many Graphics Cards?
attributes.caption: Don't worry. Just take up Bitcoin mining to make up the difference.
attributes.description: Don't worry. Just take up Bitcoin mining to make up the difference.
attributes.display_title: Bitcoin Miners Deprive Gamers of How Many Graphics Cards?

attributes.title: Layoffs at Twitch
attributes.caption: Twitch has been hit with dozens of layoffs, losing some of its most senior employees. Layoffs aren't usually a good sign for a company that's already been acquired, so what's happening here?
attributes.description: Twitch has been hit with dozens of layoffs, losing some of its most senior employees. Layoffs aren't usually a good sign for a company that's already been acquired, so what's happening here?

attributes.title: YouTube HQ Attacked by Disgruntled Content Creator
attributes.caption: YouTube headquarters in San Bruno, CA was attacked by an armed gunwoman, who appears to have had a vendetta against the company over restrictions placed on videos she uploaded to the platform.
attributes.description: YouTube headquarters in San Bruno, CA was attacked by an armed gunwoman, who appears to have had a vendetta against the company over restrictions placed on videos she uploaded to the platform.
attributes.display_title: YouTube HQ Attacked by Disgruntled Content Creator

attributes.title: YouTube Accused of Illegal Monitoring
attributes.caption: YouTube's in hot water over accusations the company has been monitoring the activities of kids.
attributes.description: YouTube's in hot water over accusations the company has been monitoring the activities of kids.

attributes.title: YouTuber Facing Jail Over Prank Video
attributes.caption: A YouTube content creator is facing jail over a prank video.
attributes.description: A YouTube content creator is facing jail over a prank video.
attributes.display_title: YouTuber Facing Jail Over Prank Video

attributes.title: Is Youtube Becoming More Like Traditional TV?
attributes.display_title: Is Youtube Becoming More Like Traditional TV?

attributes.title: Games SHUT DOWN & Websites on Blackout! GDPR is Here
attributes.caption: GDPR, the new privacy initiative for the EU, has rolled out and is affecting websites and video games for people all across Europe (and everyone else who's getting a ton of emails about updated privacy policies).
attributes.description: GDPR, the new privacy initiative for the EU, has rolled out and is affecting websites and video games for people all across Europe (and everyone else who's getting a ton of emails about updated privacy policies).
attributes.display_title: Games SHUT DOWN & Websites on Blackout! GDPR is Here
